instructions.de: In Rotary Name die Ausfahrt Richtung Destination 1 nehmen
instructions.en: Enter Rotary Name and exit towards Destination 1
instructions.eo: Enveturu Rotary Name kaj elveturu direkte al Destination 1
instructions.es: Entra en Rotary Name y sal hacia Destination 1
instructions.es-ES: En Rotary Name sal hacia Destination 1
instructions.fr: Prendre le rond-point Rotary Name et sortir en direction de Destination 1
instructions.id: Masuk Rotary Name dan keluar menuju Destination 1
instructions.it: Immettiti in Rotary Name ed esci verso Destination 1
instructions.nl: Verlaat het knooppunt Rotary Name richting Destination 1
instructions.pl: Wjedź na Rotary Name i skręć w kierunku Destination 1
instructions.pt-BR: Entre em Rotary Name e saia sentido Destination 1
instructions.ro: Intrați în Rotary Name și ieșiți spre Destination 1
instructions.ru: На Rotary Name сверните в направлении Destination 1
instructions.sv: I Rotary Name, ta av mot Destination 1
instructions.tr: Rotary Name dönel kavşağa gir ve Destination 1 istikametinde çık
instructions.uk: Рухайтесь по Rotary Name та поверніть в напрямку Destination 1
instructions.vi: Đi và Rotary Name và ra về hướng Destination 1
